Class SimulatorThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • threads.SimulatorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SimulatorThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Performs the communication between a client and a server once communication has been started

        java.net.SocketException - throws if a new socket cannot be created
